pages.title: Vault Paxel
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Vault Paxel$() is a all-in-one Tool that exceeds the normal durability of Netherite Tools and can be $(#033dfc)modified$() to have further enhancements with $(#033dfc)Paxel Charms$()

pages.title: Enhancing
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Paxels$() can be enhanced with $(#033dfc)Paxel Charms$() inside an Anvil, which will roll from a random pool as to what enhancement it will receive.$(br)The majority of enhancements are positive, however there are also negative ones.
